bpFollowedBy0: Not followed by anyone youâ€™re following
bpFollowedBy4Plus: Followed by $p1$, $p2$ and $nr$ others you follow
biggerPreviewsDesc: Tall images in tweets are shown in their full height.
disableAutoRefreshDesc:
Disables live display of tweets in your timeline.
Do not expect great results, this does not work all the time.
forceLatestDesc: Enabling the latest tweets mode is not permanent anymore. With this setting active, the site automatically switches back to the latest tweets mode.
hideMessageBoxDesc: Hides the new, all time present message box in the bottom right corner.
keepTweetsInTL: Keep Tweets (this does not work atm)
keepTweetsInTLDesc: Keep the site from automatically removing tweets once they are out of view.
leftTrendsDesc: Show the trends in the left sidebar.
